tit.j: 関西花の寺二十五霊場
tit.e: 25 Sacred Sites of Floral Temples in the Kansai Region
25 Sacred Sites of Floral Temples in the Kansai Region
25 Sacred Sites of Floral Temples in the Kansai Region

sen.j: 関西花の寺二十五霊場（かんさいはなのてらにじゅうごれいじょう）は、季節の花で名高い、大阪府、兵庫県、京都府、滋賀県、奈良県、和歌山県、の六府県六宗派二十五ヶ寺の霊場。
sen.e: The 25 Sacred Sites of Floral Temples in the Kansai Region is a pilgrimage covering 25 temples famous for seasonal flowers across the six prefectures of Osaka, Hyogo, Kyoto, Shiga, Nara and Wakayama.
The 25 Sacred Sites of Floral Temples in the Kansai Region is a pilgrimage covering 25 temples famous for seasonal flowers across the six prefectures of Osaka, Hyogo, Kyoto, Shiga, Nara and Wakayama.
The 25 Sacred Sites of Floral Temples in the Kansai Region is a pilgrimage covering 25 temples famous for seasonal flowers across the six prefectures of Osaka, Hyogo, Kyoto, Shiga, Nara and Wakayama.

sen.j: 創設意義は境内の美しい花や紅葉を通じ、信徒と寺院とのつながりを強め、人生や社会を明るく豊かにすることである。
sen.e: The pilgrimage was established in order to use the beautiful flowers and autumn leaves to strengthen the relationship that believers have with the temples as well as make life and society bright and prosperous.

The pilgrimage was established in order to use the beautiful flowers and autumn leaves to strengthen the relationship that believers have with the temples as well as make life and society bright and prosperous.
